segments.text: I'd be a basket case if you think of me that way . I need your understanding .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know , I know . But you always bat around without doing things useful .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can â€™ t you be more considerate ? I need your encouragement .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right . Do what you can do now instead of twiddling your thumbs .
segments.speaker: S2
